remarks: Double connectivity law for betweenness (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
statement:
tgbtwnconn.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwnconn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn22.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn22.1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
tgbtwnconn22.2 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= B ) $.
tgbtwnconn22.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I C ) ) $.
tgbtwnconn22.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I D ) ) $.
tgbtwnconn22.5 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( C I E ) ) $.
tgbtwnconn22 $p |- ( ph -> B e. ( D I E ) ) $.
